scripts.vendor:copy: mkdir public/vendor && mkdir public/vendor/js && mkdir public/vendor/css && mkdir public/vendor/fonts && npm run vendor:js && npm run vendor:css && npm run vendor:fonts
scripts.vendor:js: cp node_modules/angular/angular.min.js node_modules/angular-animate/angular-animate.min.js node_modules/angular-cookies/angular-cookies.min.js node_modules/angular-resource/angular-resource.min.js node_modules/angular-route/angular-route.min.js node_modules/angular-ui-bootstrap/dist/ui-bootstrap-tpls.js node_modules/angular-loading-bar/build/loading-bar.min.js node_modules/angular-upload/angular-upload.min.js node_modules/chart.js/Chart.min.js node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js public/vendor/js
scripts.js:uglify: cd public && uglifyjs js/app.js js/*/*.js -o g.min.js --source-map filename=g.min.js.map
scripts.build: npm run vendor:clean && npm run vendor:copy && npm run js:uglify
scripts.watch: npm run build && watch 'npm run js:uglify' public/js
